txt_en: Time's arrow neither stands still nor reverses.
I'm on top of the world.
May the sun shine warm upon your face.
What you earn depends on what you learn.
All the world is a stage.
Nothing is impossible if you believe.
Good things come to those who wait.
txt_cn: 耐心等待，好事自会到来。

txt_en: The eyes are the windows to the soul.
Life is a gamble, but at least you're rolling the dice.
txt_cn: 人生如赌局，但至少是你在掌掷骰子。

txt_en: The years go by in the blink of an eye.
No time is like the present.
To see the world in a grain of sand, and a heaven in a wild flower.
txt_cn: 一沙一世界，一花一天堂。
